AboutUs.title: Welcome to MR FUNGUS
AboutUs.intro: Malaysia's leading specialist in Lion's Mane Mushroom.
AboutUs.description: We focus on one mushroom and honed our craft to perfection. Grown indoors using Japanese cultivation techniques under tightly controlled conditions, every batch delivers consistent freshness, texture, and flavour. Loved by chefs and home cooks alike, our Lion’s Mane is also trusted by certified health supplement brands as a key ingredient. Due to our dedication, enjoying this premium mushroom no longer comes at a premium price.

Insights.title: How we differ from other farms
Insights.step1_desc: Unlike most farms that import ready-to-fruit mushroom bags, we built our entire research & production line in-house. This gives us the expertise and control to avoid production bottlenecks, delivering a stable year-round supply.
Insights.step2_desc: After years of refinement, we have dialed in our in-house method and the top-performing strain. The result is fresh Lion’s Mane with exceptional texture, flavour, as well as consistency, always trusted by chefs for its unmistakable taste.
Insights.step3_desc: At MR FUNGUS, quality and safety go hand in hand. We are proudly 100% organic, from start to finish.Our used substrates never go to waste too — they’re collected by our partner and transformed into compost to keep nourishing other crops.

OurStory.title: OUR STORY
OurStory.background_intro: It all Begins with a Sentimental Personal Journey:
OurStory.background_p1: Many years ago, one of our founders learned that his beloved grandmother had been diagnosed with Alzheimer’s disease. Driven by love and concern, he began searching for ways to improve brain health. By chance, he discovered that lion’s mane mushroom possesses neuroprotective — and even regenerative — properties. That sparked a desire to grow it himself.
OurStory.background_p2: Like many journeys toward success, the path wasn’t smooth. Tragically, his grandmother passed away before the first successful harvest. Though she never got to witness the results of his efforts, her memory and his regret strengthened his resolve to bring fresh lion’s mane mushrooms to the public.
OurStory.background_p3: At the time, he realized that most lion’s mane mushrooms available in the market were dried imports from China. It’s worth noting that lion’s mane’s two key active compounds — hericenones and erinacines — are extremely fragile. Common processing methods like drying or deep frying can destroy these valuable nutrients and their health benefits.
OurStory.lab_p1: In 2019, MR FUNGUS (Remora Resources PLT) was officially established to focus on the research and development of cultivation techniques for premium-quality lion's mane mushrooms. After five years of continuous experimentation and refinement, we finally developed a stable and efficient growing method — turning local, large-scale production of premium lion’s mane mushrooms into reality.
OurStory.lab_p2: Starting from growing mycelium in petri dishes and transferring it onto 99.99% sterilized wood substrates, our cultivation method closely mimics the mushroom’s natural wild environment. By choosing European oak as the primary substrate, combined with advanced Japanese indoor-farming technology, we have achieved a truly organic, pesticide-free, and contamination-free cultivation process.

Mission.title: Our Mission
Mission.content: Each production cycle takes about 50 days. We take no shortcuts, ensuring every lion’s mane mushroom is fully developed, healthy, and nutritionally rich before each harvest.
